name: Mark Racer
description:
Mark racer is a 2d top-down racing game made for Markjam 3.
There are 3 cars and 3 tracks at the moment, although i might add more tracks in the future.
No twists or anything, just a basic racing game.
The cars all have different stats, so try them out and see what you like.

credits:

sfx/music: drwual ( drdrwal (newgrounds.com) )

coding/art: HamsterOnTheMic

Controls:

W to accelerate

S to brake

A/D to steer
